transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hello? Yes, hello. Am I speaking with Santa? Yes, hi, this side from University College London's accommodation portal. That is Amber. Yes. See you have inquired regarding a bronze studio. Yeah, I see you have inquired regarding a bronze studio mid level at developer. Right, sorry, I can't hear clearly, so could you repeat? Yeah. So basically, I see you have inquired regarding a bronze studio mid level at Chapter Porto Portobello for 51 weeks. Right? Yes. So basically you do not have to pay anything to us. So how your booking process will look is. I tried texting you on WhatsApp. So there is a link. You can basically fill up all your details, all your details on that link and we will be. We will proceed with your booking and once we proceed with your booking, once your booking is processed. Just give me a moment. Yeah, it's for 399 pounds per week, right. Drawn studio, mid level. Yeah. All you need to do is basically fill up all the booking and. Sorry, fill up all the details in the link. And once you fill up the details, you might be directed towards a payment space which you basically do not have to pay any. There, there might be. It might ask you to pay a ¬£50 or a ¬£25. What's it? Processing fees. Processing fees. But you do not have to pay that. That's a discount from my end. So you can just fill out the details and let me know once you're done. And once you're done with filling up the details, I will process your booking and I will collect all the required details from you over WhatsApp itself. And once I process your booking, you will directly get an email from the property side and your. You will. We will also create a student portal under your name and I will send share with you the credentials there. That is where you will get your agreement and that is where you need to pay your rent. Okay. Okay. And there is no booking. There is no booking deposit for this property too. Right, Perfect. Okay. So thank you so much. I'm sending you a link over your WhatsApp. I guess this is your number, right? Double four, seven, 432-87-3415 plus double four, seven, four. Yeah. Okay, so I'm sending you the link over your WhatsApp. Kindly fill the form and I will process your button. Okay, perfect. Thank you so much. Thank you. Have a nice day. Thank you. Have a good day.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person.

Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hello? Hello? Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yes, can you hear me?
Speaker B: Can you hear me?
Speaker A: Yes, I can hear you now.
Speaker B: Yeah, I was saying that we basically processed the booking and you must have got a reply from the property directly. That is from Saifur Rahman. So he is the property management associate. So we have said yes to them. And you must have got an email from his end. We are also in the cc, so all you need to do is now you'll have to basically send him a copy of your passport, your home address, your student id, proof if you have or an enrollment letter. And you can. You. You need to send your contact number. All this. You'll have to email them.
Speaker A: Okay. I don't have my enrollment letter yet. Is that okay?
Speaker B: Do you have anything like unconditional offer letter?
Speaker A: Yes, I have unconditional offer letter.
Speaker B: You can. You can do that.
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: You can add that. That'll do.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. Thank you so much. You've been very helpful.
Speaker B: No worries. That's my job. And reply to. All right. Just don't reply to Sapphire. Reply to all so that we all can see your reply.
Speaker A: Okay. And the additional fees, is that for later?
Speaker B: No, no, you do not have it. You do not have Departure Cleaning is like. You'll have to pay later. Yeah, later. Later makes sense.
Speaker A: Yeah. Okay. Okay, thank you so much.
Speaker B: Bye.
Speaker A: Bye.

Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hi, Shanta. Member student. We connected regarding your accommodation booking. So I mentioned regarding an email to you, if you remember. Did you reply to that email?
Speaker B: Not yet. We, I, we were just talking about the. What is it called, the installment stuff that I'm going to send all the documents now.
Speaker A: Oh, I understand. Okay, so as, as I told you yesterday, reply to. All right.
Speaker B: Yes, I'm going to do that.
Speaker A: Okay, thank you.
Speaker B: Okay. Thank you so much.
Speaker A: Have a nice day.

Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello. Hi, Shanta.
Speaker B: Hi.
Speaker A: Again. So, yeah, I just wanted to let you know that I guess you have also checked your email, right? You just have received an email from the properties end.
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: Yeah. So basically there you need to accept the contract. Accepted. You already accepted your contract, right?
Speaker B: Yes, I paid the deposit as well.
Speaker A: You paid the deposit as well. So basically your booking is complete. So can you please send me. You must have received the confirmation email too, right?
Speaker B: I'll have a look. Yeah, I'll check and.
Speaker A: If in case you did, just forward it to me. Right.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: Thank you. Thank you so much.
Speaker A: Have a nice day.
